overview: Carla Corkern joined Talyst in 2008. She brings a strategic mindset with high-tech and business savvy to the role of Talyst’s CEO and Chairman of the Board. Carla has over 20 years of experience in high-tech and supply chain management. She has helped build a number of highly-successful technology companies. Carla is active in a number of charitable organizations, and serves on the Girl Scouts of Western Washington’s Board of Directors. She was named one of the Top 100 Women in Seattle Technology and is a strong advocate for women seeking technology careers.

relationships.title: Chief Executive Officer, Chairman of the Board
